ext_path.h

00001 #ifndef _EXT_PATH_H_
00002 #define _EXT_PATH_H_
00003 
00004 // ext_path.h -- path definitions
00005 
00006 #ifdef __cplusplus
00007 extern "C" {
00008 #endif
00009 
00010 #if C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACKPUSH
00011     #pragma pack(push, 2)
00012 #elif C74_PRAGMA_STRUCT_PACK
00013     #pragma pack(2)
00014 #endif
00015 
00016 
00017 #if defined(MAC_VERSION) || defined(WIN_VERSION)
00018 
00019 //#ifdef INCLUDE_APPLE_HEADERS
00020 //#include <Files.h>
00021 //#endif
00022 
00023 typedef FSSpec PATH_SPEC;
00024 typedef short FILE_REF;
00025 
00026 #define SEPARATOR_CHAR      '/'
00027 #define PATH_CROSS_PLAT_NAMES   
00028 
00029 // PATH_STYLE_* + PATH_TYPE_* determine path_nameconform's behavior
00030 
00031 #define PATH_STYLE_MAX              0       // use PATH_STYLE_MAX_PLAT
00032 #define PATH_STYLE_NATIVE           1       // use PATH_STYLE_NATIVE_PLAT
00033 #define PATH_STYLE_COLON            2       // ':'  sep, "vol:"   volume, ":"   relative, "^:" boot
00034 #define PATH_STYLE_SLASH            3       // '/'  sep, "vol:/"  volume, "./"  relative, "/"  boot
00035 #define PATH_STYLE_NATIVE_WIN       4       // '\\' sep, "vol:\\" volume, ".\\" relative, "\\" boot
00036 
00037 #ifdef WIN_VERSION 
00038 #define PATH_STYLE_MAX_PLAT         PATH_STYLE_SLASH
00039 #define PATH_STYLE_NATIVE_PLAT      PATH_STYLE_NATIVE_WIN
00040 #else
00041 #define PATH_STYLE_MAX_PLAT         PATH_STYLE_SLASH
00042 #define PATH_STYLE_NATIVE_PLAT      PATH_STYLE_COLON
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 #define PATH_TYPE_IGNORE            0
00046 #define PATH_TYPE_ABSOLUTE          1
00047 #define PATH_TYPE_RELATIVE          2
00048 #define PATH_TYPE_BOOT              3
00049 #define PATH_TYPE_C74               4
00050 
00051 #ifdef PATH_CROSS_PLAT_NAMES
00052 #define PATH_CHAR_IS_SEPARATOR(c) (((c) == ':') || ((c) == '/') || ((c) == '\\'))
00053 #else
00054 #define PATH_CHAR_IS_SEPARATOR(c) ((c) == SEPARATOR_CHAR)
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 #endif
00058 
00059 
00060 // fileinfo flags 
00061 enum {  
00062     FILEINFO_ALIAS = 1, 
00063     FILEINFO_FOLDER = 2
00064 };
00065     
00066 // permissions, these are the same as on the Mac
00067 enum {  
00068     READ_PERM = 1,  
00069     WRITE_PERM = 2, 
00070     RW_PERM = 3
00071 };
00072 
00073 enum {  
00074     STARTUP_PATH = 0,
00075     SEARCH_PATH = 1,    
00076     ACTION_PATH = 2,    
00077     HELP_PATH = 3
00078 };
00079 
00080 // indices allow for fast access
00081 typedef struct _fileinfo{   
00082     long type;  
00083     long creator;       // Mac-only I guess 
00084     long date;  
00085     long flags;
00086 } t_fileinfo;
00087 
00088 typedef struct _path{   
00089     void *p_name;       // all we have on Windows, may just be folder name on Mac   
00090     long p_dirID;       // directory ID on Mac  
00091     short p_vRefNum;    // volume on Mac    
00092     short p_wd;         // working directory on the Mac (compatibility mode)
00093 } t_path;
00094 
00095 typedef struct _pathlink{   
00096     short l_path;       // index into path table, or p_wd in compatibility mode 
00097     short l_parent;     // logical parent, i.e., what path caused this path to be included  
00098     short l_permanent;  // non-zero if a permanent path (saved in preferences)  
00099     struct _pathlink *l_next;
00100 } t_pathlink;
00101 
00102 #ifndef __PATHMETHOD__
00103 typedef Boolean (*pathmethod)(void *arg, PATH_SPEC *par, short patharg);
00104 #endif // __PATHMETHOD__
00105 
00106 short genpath(PATH_SPEC *fs);
00107 short path_lookup(PATH_SPEC *fs);
00108 short path_new(PATH_SPEC *fs);
00109 short path_tospec(short path, char *name, PATH_SPEC *fs);
00110 void path_namefromspec(PATH_SPEC *fs, char *name);
00111 void path_setpermanent(t_pathlink *list, short parent);
00112 void path_addnamed(long pathtype, char *name, short recursive, short permanent);

00144 void path_setprefstring(short type, short index, t_symbol *s, short update);
